author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-4Sight Holdings Says Foursight South Africa Acquires 100 Pct Of Xwes Proprietary Limited T/A Ntsika Ict Security
text:
April 30 (Reuters) - 4Sight Holdings Ltd:
* ACQUISITION OF 100% OF XWES PROPRIETARY LIMITED T/A NTSIKA ICT SECURITY
* FOURSIGHT SOUTH AFRICA ENTERED INTO AGREEMENT FOR ACQUISITION OF 100% OF SHARES IN XWES PROPRIETARY LTD T/A NTSIKA ICT SECURITY WITH EFFECT FROM APRIL 1
* AGGREGATE PURCHASE CONSIDERATION WILL BE PAID PRIMARILY ON AN EARN-OUT BASIS IN 4SIGHT HOLDINGS SHARES Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Reuters.Briefs@thomsonreuters.com)
